author: cbs8
title: Tony Franklin System Celebrating 15 Years Of Providing Winning Solutions From Goal To Goal
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Tony Franklin System
Cal Bears Offensive Coordinator, Tony Franklin credits his success to the thousands of high school coaches whom he's learned from over the years. Watch and learn Thursday, October 22 7pm ESPN.
BERKELEY, Calif. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Tony Franklin Football will be on full display this Thursday on ESPN when the Cal Bears take on the UCLA Bruins in the iconic Rose Bowl in Pasadena. Clients nationwide have been attending the Tony Franklin Seminars for the past 15 years learning how to install and implement his up-tempo high scoring offensive system. Through the Tony Franklin System (TFS) 24/7/365 consulting membership, coaches gain an inside perspective on Coach Franklin's game preparations from practice schedules, plans, strategy, personnel, scheme, adjustments, etc. Visit www.tonyfranklinfootball.com to learn more about how " Tony Franklin had to get fired, blackballed, and cast out of the coaching community to arguably do more for the evolution of football at the high school and lower levels than any coach of the last decade." – Chris Brown , Smart Football
The Tony Franklin System's unique approach to learning from your peers has recently been acknowledged by highly accredited media outlets such as:
The Wall Street Journal: Why the Architect of the Golden Bears Prolific Offense Collects Input from a Network of High School Coaches Forbes: Network Leaders Connect the Dots to Innovate, Faster More Clever Football NPR: Only a Game, The Gospel of Tony Franklin CBS Sports: Lifelong Southerner, turned Ultra Liberal, Tony Franklin at home at Cal TFS seminars are unlike any other coaching clinic in the country. Here is a glimpse: Tony Franklin System Berkeley
Kwyn Jenkins
Director of Client Relations
Tony Franklin Football
